feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Role name and display name updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14579
  • Fix for row automation triggers when table deleted by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.3...2.32.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • More google sheets tests by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14586
  • Fix Google Sheets pagination. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14589
  • Fix Postgres "cannot pass more than 100 arguments" issue by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14588

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.4...2.32.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update automations to default to using names for accessing context by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14554
  • Require a flag to be set to query PostHog for feature flags. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14607
  • Add table ID to row deletion requests that only contain string IDs by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.5...2.32.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix conditions with empty values falsely evaluating to true by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14606
  • fetchSchema tests for Google Sheets integration by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14610
  • Make view readonly columns available for free by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14592
  • Updating CouchDB image versions across the board to v3.3.3-sqs-v2.1.1 by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14616
  • Bump next from 14.1.1 to 14.2.10 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14593
  • Part 2 of 2 - Budi 8608 ai platform level config by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14602
  • Fixing AI test cases. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14627
  • Google Sheets search tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14612
  • Update the version of PostHog used in the cli package. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14633
  • Some bug fixes by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14629
  • MariaDB - avoid using correlated sub-queries by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14630

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.6...2.32.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • App metadata missing - temp fix by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14636
  • Enrich squashed links values by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14637
  • Increase PostHog flag polling interval to 3 minutes. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14640
  • Shrink the size of the attachment fields set to "compact" by @mikesealey in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14613
  • Updating account portal submodule. by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14641

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.7...2.32.8
